version_description:
**As seen live on stage at the 2016 Apple Keynote**
THE FIRST HIKING APP FOR APPLE WATCH SERIES 2!
ViewRanger for Apple Watch is designed to follow routes curated by top publishers. To start, we’ve launched more than 9,000 watch-compatible routes in USA and UK. View directional arrows, navigation notes, photographs, and an overview map on the watch screen. It also works offline using the built-in GPS on Apple Watch Series 2. (Compatible with other Apple Watch models when connected to an iPhone too.)

Key features:
● Easily accessible route guides on your wrist
● Haptic feedback at every waypoint 
● ViewRanger Apple Watch app shows time, distance , and elevation gain. 
● A hike counts as a workout, which contributes to your Activity Rings.
● Optimised for watchOS 3

We would love to hear your thoughts and feedback. 
For any questions please contact support@viewranger.com
If you’re enjoying our latest update please rate the app.

**As seen live on stage at the 2016 Apple Keynote**
THE FIRST HIKING APP FOR APPLE WATCH SERIES 2!
ViewRanger for Apple Watch is designed to follow routes curated by top publishers. To start, we’ve launched more than 9,000 watch-compatible routes in USA and UK. View directional arrows, navigation notes, photographs, and an overview map on the watch screen. It also works offline using the built-in GPS on Apple Watch Series 2. (Compatible with other Apple Watch models when connected to an iPhone too.)

Key features:
● Easily accessible route guides on your wrist
● Haptic feedback at every waypoint 
● ViewRanger Apple Watch app shows time, distance , and elevation gain. 
● A hike counts as a workout, which contributes to your Activity Rings.
● Optimised for watchOS 3

We would love to hear your thoughts and feedback. 
For any questions please contact support@viewranger.com
If you’re enjoying our latest update please rate the app.

Now you can use any route on your Apple Watch.
- Add published routes and your own routes to Apple Watch.
- Follow these routes without your iPhone using Apple Watch Series 2. (Works on previous Apple Watch models whilst connected using your iPhone)

Maps on Apple Watch, including your premium detailed maps. 
- New ‘Map View Mode’ See your GPS location on a map without following a route
- View your premium maps, such as the USGS USA topo map.
- View all 5 free saveable global maps
- Zoom maps using the digital crown 
- See maps when following a route 

Curated Apple Watch Routes available in USA & UK with enhanced turn by turn navigation.

Now you can use any route on your Apple Watch.
- Add published routes and your own routes to Apple Watch.
- Follow these routes without your iPhone using Apple Watch Series 2. (Works on previous Apple Watch models whilst connected using your iPhone)

- View your premium maps, such as the USGS USA topo map.
- View all 5 free saveable global maps
- Zoom maps using the digital crown 
- See maps when following a route 

Curated Apple Watch Routes available in USA & UK with enhanced turn by turn navigation.

- New 7 day free trial for France & Belgium topo maps (no payment required).
- Bug fixes and improvements for Apple Watch app.

- New 7 day free trial for France & Belgium topo maps (no payment required).
- Bug fixes and improvements for Apple Watch app.

- Now you can view your recorded tracks on Apple Watch and use it as a remote control for track recording.  
- New 7 day free trial for France & Belgium topo maps (no payment required).

There’s a brand new ‘Feed’ in your Profile:
- See updates when ViewRanger explorers publish new route guides and upload tracks.
- We’ve also made it easier to follow route guide publishers and friends.
- Newly designed track details view.
- Invite friends to ViewRanger.

- It's now even easier to sign up and log in to ViewRanger using Facebook and Google.

- New ViewRanger icon

Like ViewRanger? Share the love by leaving an app review. Questions? Our support team is here to help you. support@viewranger.com

We've redesigned our Apple Watch app and included a bunch of watchOS 4 features:
- Download nearby routes directly from your watch (over cellular with Apple Watch Series 3)
- View any map in full screen
- Pan and zoom maps to view areas in more detail

We've added push notifications, so we can let you know about route guides we think you'll love, exciting news & events and exclusive ViewRanger offers.
We've added push notifications, so we can let you know about route guides we think you'll love, exciting news & events and exclusive ViewRanger offers.
Now compatible with iPhone 8 & iPhone X
Now compatible with iPhone 8 & iPhone X

New augmented reality features in Skyline: View a breadcrumb trail of where you've been and see markers at your feet showing time and distance info.
For Apple Watch Series 3 owners, we now use the barometer to provide more accurate height gain and loss.

New augmented reality features in Skyline: View a breadcrumb trail of where you've been and see markers at your feet showing time and distance info.
For Apple Watch Series 3 owners, we now use the barometer to provide more accurate height gain and loss.

Let’s Explore! Update your app for the latest features. This update:

* Improves how you save offline maps after downloading a route
* Features more offline map styles when downloading a route 
* Bug fixes

NEW! We’ve launched annual Premium subscriptions for Canada and New Zealand.

- View and download Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) maps and LINZ maps for New Zealand 
- Unlimited offline saving 
- Includes topographic maps at 1:50,000 scale for Canada, and topographic maps at 1:50,000 and 1:250,000 scale for New Zealand
- Identify trails, peaks, forests, rivers, contours, and other off-road terrain

- Identify trails, peaks, forests, rivers, contours, and other off-road terrain

New Design!
We’ve made it easier to record tracks and view stats from the Map screen.

- Start, pause, and stop tracks on the Map screen
- View time and distance stats on the Map screen
- Scroll up to see more stats
- Revisions to privacy and notification settings
Big thanks to our ViewRanger explorers who tested this new Track interface and provided lots of constructive feedback.

NEW! We’ve launched a new U.S. Premium subscription.  
 - View and download topo maps for the whole U.S. including Hawaii & Alaska
 - Unlimited offline saving
 - Includes 4 detailed map types at 1:24,000 scale
 - Identify trails, peaks, forests, rivers, contours, and other off-road terrain

It’s now easier to follow route guides! This re-designed feature works with all 180,000+ route guides shared by publishers and routes you planned yourself. Highlights:
- Read directions at a glance on the Map screen
- Tap for a full list of turn-by-turn waypoint directions
- View the distances between your GPS location and other waypoints

NEW! We’ve launched a new Netherlands Premium subscription.
• 1:25k & 1:50k scale topographic maps by Kadaster
•  Unlimited downloads for offline use
 • Identify trails, peaks, forests, rivers, and more

You asked. We listened.
Find maps based on the center point of the Map screen. With more than 600 map styles from 30 map providers across the world, it’s now easier to find the outdoor maps available for your specific adventure.

Fixes an issue that accidentally pauses track recording

Fixes an issue that accidentally pauses track recording

Get more with our new PREMIUM packages. PREMIUM includes Skyline, 3D Flyovers, BuddyBeacon, and unlimited Offline Maps.
Or, check out our new PREMIUM + Map bundles with detailed topographic maps in select countries: UK, USA, France, New Zealand, Canada, Netherlands, and Belgium.
- Some small visual enhancements and bug fixes.

New! Adding photos to tracks is one of the most-requested features by ViewRanger explorers. This feature is now live!
- Capture photos in the ViewRanger app while recording a track. The photo is geo-tagged to its exact GPS location.
- Add photos to any saved track in your ViewRanger profile.

-New topographic maps for Australia, Norway and Spain.  Keep active and check your Challenge progress in-app.  Easier to auto-rotate maps based on your compass direction.  Let’s explore!
-Challenges:   Join our community of users pledging to get active.  Sign up for a Challenge in the app and check your progress.  We’ll be launching our famous Walk2019 Challenge and other challenges soon.
-More Maps:   We’ve added detailed topographic maps for Australia, Norway and Spain.  Sourced directly from the national map agencies to ensure we bring you the best maps for your adventure.  (These premium maps require an in-app purchase)
-Now easier to auto-rotate maps:   Switch between north-up and heading-up (auto-rotating based on your compass direction) map display by tapping on the GPS/compass button on the map screen.  First tap centers on your location, tap again to switch on map rotation, tap again to switch off.
-Updates to Map Shop:   More details shown when browsing a map product including map coverage area and information about the map publisher.

Get more with our new PREMIUM packages. PREMIUM includes Skyline, 3D Flyovers, BuddyBeacon, and unlimited Offline Maps.
Or, check out our new PREMIUM + Map bundles with detailed topographic maps in select countries: UK, USA, France, New Zealand, Canada, Netherlands, and Belgium.
- Some small visual enhancements and bug fixes.

NEW! It’s now easier to plot your own adventure routes.
-Place, position, and insert waypoints directly with your finger.
-Use the all new Magnify Window to drop waypoints with pinpoint accuracy on the map.
-Made a mistake? You can now easily undo changes too.
-Works great with Apple Pencil on iPad too!

-Use the all new Magnify Window to drop waypoints with pinpoint accuracy on the map.
-Made a mistake? You can now easily undo changes too.
-Works great with Apple Pencil on iPad too!

This week we are launching AutoPlot, a new PREMIUM feature for our amazing subscribers. 

Introducing AutoPlot
- Map adventure routes in just seconds. 
- AutoPlot finds and draws the best routes for you. 
- Walk, hike, or cycle? Let AutoPlot find the way based on your activity.  
- Available now to all PREMIUM and PREMIUM + subscribers.
Coordinate types now include what3words

This week we are launching AutoPlot, a new PREMIUM feature for our amazing subscribers. 

Introducing AutoPlot
- Map adventure routes in just seconds. 
- AutoPlot finds and draws the best routes for you. 
- Walk, hike, or cycle? Let AutoPlot find the way based on your activity.  
- Available now to all PREMIUM and PREMIUM + subscribers.
Coordinate types now include what3words

Even More with AutoPlot
Our newest AutoPlot features answer your most pressing questions as you plan your next adventure.
How far is my route?
Know what to expect. See the total distance as you plot your way.
Is that uphill or downhill?
Breathe easier or not. See your route’s full elevation profile and its total ascent.
How long will it take?
Be home for dinner. AutoPlot estimates your trip’s duration based on activity, distance, and terrain.

- This release adds automatic synchronisation of your points-of-interest (POI) across your mobile devices.
- Browse, locate, and use your POI on your phone and tablet. Any new POI or edits you make to an existing POI are automatically sent to your other devices running the app.
- And if you add a new device to your ViewRanger account, then it will restore your collection of POIs automatically.

- This release adds automatic synchronisation of your points-of-interest (POI) across your mobile devices.
- Browse, locate, and use your POI on your phone and tablet. Any new POI or edits you make to an existing POI are automatically sent to your other devices running the app.
- And if you add a new device to your ViewRanger account, then it will restore your collection of POIs automatically.

- This release adds automatic synchronisation of your points-of-interest (POI) across your mobile devices.
- Browse, locate, and use your POI on your phone and tablet. Any new POI or edits you make to an existing POI are automatically sent to your other devices running the app.
- And if you add a new device to your ViewRanger account, then it will restore your collection of POIs automatically.

- This release adds automatic synchronisation of your points-of-interest (POI) across your mobile devices.
- Browse, locate, and use your POI on your phone and tablet. Any new POI or edits you make to an existing POI are automatically sent to your other devices running the app.
- And if you add a new device to your ViewRanger account, then it will restore your collection of POIs automatically.

Goodbye from us.  We have now switched off access to the ViewRanger app.  Thank you to the global community of ViewRanger users who helped make our adventures so much fun.

We recommend you download and use the Outdooractive app instead of ViewRanger.  We offer you an easy way to move to the Outdooractive app - where you can continue to access your maps, tracks, routes, POIs, and other ViewRanger app data.

Search for "Outdooractive" and download the app for free.  

We'll see you in the Outdooractive community
